properties.name: He-Shan
properties.story: Great-great Grandma Dora's mom is born in He-Shan city (鹤山市), Guangdong Province (廣東省), China on April 14, 1903. So, that was Amelia's Great-great-great Grandmother.

properties.name: Chinatown
properties.story: Ah Fong Wood Chun (馮活泉) was Grandpa Fong to your great grandmother. He made a fortune in San Francisco.

properties.name: Hong Kong
properties.story: He returned to Hong Kong after he lost his fortune and adopted Fong Lai Kam(馮麗琴), Grandma Saw's mother.

properties.name: Macau
properties.story: Great-great Grandpa Fong took Lai Kam and his wife to Macau before World War II.

properties.name: Canton (Guangzhou)
properties.story: Great-great Grandpa Fong took Lai Kam and his wife fled to Canton at the start of World War II. Because the Japanese were invading China!

properties.name: Luo-Ding City (羅定市)
properties.story: Great Grandma Saw Moved to Luo-Ding City (羅定市) in the winter of 1941 during World War 2. When they lived there her mom saved her 3 year old sister Pam from drowning in the river.

properties.name: Deqing (德慶)
properties.story: In 1944 they moved to Deqing (德慶) after staying in a Haunted House in Canton.

properties.name: Wuzhou
properties.story: Great-great Grandpa Fong worked in Wuzhou and hid aboard a Japanese boat to get back to the family in Deqing

properties.name: Ma-xu (馬墟)
properties.story: From Deqing they moved to Ma-xu (馬墟) where Great-great Grandpa Fong helped people with the best medicine he knew. The people were grateful and gave them food to eat because no one had any money.

properties.name: Canton (Guangzhou)
properties.story: World War II ended in the summer of 1945 and Great-great Grandpa Fong took his family back to Canton.

properties.name: Macau
properties.story: In May, 1962 the family moved back to Macau.

properties.name: Loma Linda
properties.story: Great Grandma Saw married Great Grandpa Saw (Eng Chuan(永泉)) and they lived in Loma Linda while Grandma Saw went to nursing school and Grandpa Saw went to medical school.

properties.name: Loma Linda Pool
properties.story: Great Grandma Saw babysat 10 kids during the day and two babies at night. She put the older kids in swim lessons while she finished her Microbiology class.
